text:
e="preserve">Stuart Cornfeld (November 15, 1952 – June 26, 2020) was an American movie producer, and actor. He was business partners with Ben Stiller in the company, Red Hour Productions. He was born in Tarzana, California. He was known for producing "Zoolander", "Tropic Thunder" and '.
Cornfeld died on June 26, 2020 from cancer at the age of 67.
